text: You are trained with medium armor.
You add your level to your Dodge Bonus while equipped with armor with the \lq Medium \rq descriptor.
Additionally, your Agility can not exceed 9 while wearing this type of armor.
You gain a +{{oldRank}}d4 Skill Bonus on Dodge checks, a +{{oldRank}} Skill Bonus to Lower, and a +{{conditionalText[0]}} Skill Bonus to Higher Dodge.
Your Agility can now not exceed {{conditionalText[1]}} while wearing medium armor.
